rows.label: bf08390100_0010
rows.name:
Man, what's goin' on here? I never expected
the World Tree to be like this inside.

rows.label: bf08390100_0020
rows.name:
It's not a natural tree at all, but
some kind of artificial tower.

rows.label: bf08390100_0030
rows.name:
It appears to be built by the same
civilization we saw in Mors.

rows.label: bf08390100_0040
rows.name:
"God's birthplace"... That's
what Shin called it.

rows.label: bf08390100_0050
rows.name:
So this tower was built
by God himself...

rows.label: bf08390100_0060
rows.name:
Is God really at the top of
the tower? Is Eden there?

rows.label: bf08390100_0070
rows.name:
From what we saw in Mors, we're talkin' way more
than a thousand or two thousand years ago, yeah?

rows.label: bf08390100_0080
rows.name:
We're talkin' tens of thousands
of years ago, or even longer!

rows.label: bf08390100_0090
rows.name:
Even Divine Beasts couldn't
survive that long.

rows.label: bf08390100_0100
rows.name:
Homura and Hikari say they've never even met
him. Yet here's this tower, real as can be.

rows.label: bf08390100_0110
rows.name: If that's the case...

rows.label: bf08390100_0120
rows.name: "Seeing is believing," huh?

rows.label: bf08390100_0130
rows.name:
True, we can speculate all we want
here, but we won't make any progress.

rows.label: bf08390100_0140
rows.name:
Nia, what's wrong, Mo-mo? Is
your tummy growling, Mo-mo?

rows.label: bf08390100_0150
rows.name: You just...

rows.label: bf08390100_0160
rows.name:
Every time you look at someone, it's either "Did
you lose your wallet?" or "Are you hungry?"

rows.label: bf08390100_0165
rows.name: Can't you think of anything else to ask?

rows.label: bf08390100_0170
rows.name: Mo...

rows.label: bf08390100_0180
rows.name:
Tora never see Nia serious about
anything except food, mo.

rows.label: bf08390100_0190
rows.name: I'll knock you out!

rows.label: bf08390100_0200
rows.name: So what is it then?

rows.label: bf08390100_0210
rows.name:
I don't like your tone there,
but I'll let it slide...

rows.label: bf08390100_0220
rows.name:
I have a question for
all the Blades here.

rows.label: bf08390100_0230
rows.name:
Being completely honest, have you
ever wished you could live longer?

rows.label: bf08390100_0240
rows.name:
You mean without returning
to our Core Crystal?

rows.label: bf08390100_0250
rows.name: Yeah.

rows.label: bf08390100_0260
rows.name: That's a tough question...

rows.label: bf08390100_0270
rows.name:
I'm curious about my previous selves, but as for
continuing to exist after Meleph-sama dies...

rows.label: bf08390100_0275
rows.name: I apologize.

rows.label: bf08390100_0280
rows.name: No, don't worry about it.

rows.label: bf08390100_0290
rows.name:
I have no desire to continue
existing after she's gone.

rows.label: bf08390100_0300
rows.name: Yeah, same here.

rows.label: bf08390100_0310
rows.name:
I want my memories with the
Prince to stay just between us.

rows.label: bf08390100_0320
rows.name: Aww, you're saying such sweet things!

rows.label: bf08390100_0330
rows.name: And you, Byakko?

rows.label: bf08390100_0340
rows.name:
As long as I can remain by my lady's
side until the end, I will be content.

rows.label: bf08390100_0350
rows.name:
Because Hana is artificial, thinking
about future makes Hana sad, mo.

rows.label: bf08390100_0360
rows.name:
If Masterpon dies, I
will become a widow.

rows.label: bf08390100_0370
rows.name: Mo!

rows.label: bf08390100_0380
rows.name:
I think that's a bit different, but I can
understand where you're coming from.

rows.label: bf08390100_0390
rows.name: Homura?

rows.label: bf08390100_0400
rows.name: Well, I...

rows.label: bf08390100_0410
rows.name:
You're different from the others, Homura.
You've been alive for hundreds of years.

rows.label: bf08390100_0420
rows.name:
I wasn't talking to you. Homura, tell
me honestly, how do you feel about it?

rows.label: bf08390100_0430
rows.name: Hey...

rows.label: bf08390100_0440
rows.name:
I used to wonder why I
have to exist forever.

rows.label: bf08390100_0450
rows.name:
I must continue to exist
indefinitely... that's what I thought.

rows.label: bf08390100_0460
rows.name: But...

rows.label: bf08390100_0470
rows.name: It's different now.

rows.label: bf08390100_0480
rows.name: I'm grateful to have existed this long.

rows.label: bf08390100_0490
rows.name:
Partings are sad, but that's
also part of who I am.

rows.label: bf08390100_0500
rows.name: ...But if someday

rows.label: bf08390100_0510
rows.name:
I could rest eternally with someone I cherish, that
would be true happiness... that's what I think.

rows.label: bf08390100_0520
rows.name: Homura...

rows.label: bf08390100_0530
rows.name: That's so like you.

rows.label: bf08390100_0540
rows.name:
Thank you. I really appreciate
hearing all your perspectives.

rows.label: bf08390100_0550
rows.name:
Hey, what made you ask
that question anyway?

rows.label: bf08390100_0560
rows.name: I'm a Man-Eater.

rows.label: bf08390100_0570
rows.name:
To be honest, I have no
idea how long I'll live.

rows.label: bf08390100_0580
rows.name: Perhaps I might suddenly die tomorrow.

rows.label: bf08390100_0590
rows.name: My lady...

rows.label: bf08390100_0600
rows.name:
But one thing's for sure: My life
and death aren't tied to any [System:Ruby rt=Driver ]human[/System:Ruby].

rows.label: bf08390100_0610
rows.name: And that is?

rows.label: bf08390100_0620
rows.name: It's Shin I'm thinking about.

rows.label: bf08390100_0630
rows.name:
I've been wondering
about this for a while.

rows.label: bf08390100_0640
rows.name: Shin has been collecting Core Crystals.

rows.label: bf08390100_0650
rows.name:
So why doesn't he use them?
Doesn't he hate humans?

rows.label: bf08390100_0660
rows.name:
He could use them to create Blades,
then turn them into Man-Eaters.

rows.label: bf08390100_0670
rows.name:
He could build his army indefinitely
without needing humans.

rows.label: bf08390100_0680
rows.name: Indeed, are they all there is?

rows.label: bf08390100_0690
rows.name:
Yeah... These days they're just
a tiny group of 5 people.

rows.label: bf08390100_0695
rows.name:
Before, when Metsu suggested resonating with Kamui
and the others, Shin was always against it.

rows.label: bf08390100_0700
rows.name:
Maybe... Maybe he feels
the same way we do...

rows.label: bf08390100_0710
rows.name: Just like us...

rows.label: bf08390100_0720
rows.name:
That might be why Shin doesn't
resonate with anyone...
